Title: Requires the state board of elections to develop a program to be administered by all boards of elections to notify voters of certain information where their area has been redistricted
Summary: Requires the state board of elections to develop a program to be administered by all boards of elections to notify voters of certain information where their area has been redistricted.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring the state board of elections to develop a program to be administered by all boards of elections to notify voters of certain information where their area has been redistricted
